constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 10 (Tuesday, January 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DOGGETT:
H.R. 372
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of Section 8 of Article I of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H206]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: For the relief of Alirio Palacios Gamez, Hilda Veronica Ramirez Mendez, and Jayro Ivan Juarez Ramirez.
